Our Story

Handcrafted Excellence

At Charlie’s, we believe that every bite should be an experience. Our journey began with a passion for creating popcorn that’s not just delicious, but memorable.

What Makes Us Different

  • Handcrafted in small batches for perfect texture

  • Only the finest, natural ingredients

  • Sustainable and eco‑friendly practices

Our Promise

“We promise to deliver popcorn that’s not just a snack, but an experience. Each flavor is crafted with care.”

Our Flavors

Hand-crafted varieties for every palate. Hover to discover!

Salted

Classic simplicity. Freshly popped corn sprinkled with just the right amount of fine sea salt.

Tomato

Tangy and sweet. A zesty blend of sun-ripened tomatoes and savory spices that bursts with flavor.

Peri‑Peri

Spicy kick. A bold mix of African bird’s eye chili, lemon, and garlic for those who love heat.

Schezwan

Asian fusion. An exotic combination of Sichuan peppers and pungent spices for a unique fiery taste.
